2nd 3rd 4th 5th 6th 7th 8th 9th 10th 11th 12th 13th 14th 15th 16th 17th 18th 19th 20th 21st 22nd 23rd 24th 25th 26th 27th 28th 29th 30th eclipses seen from australia china philippines russia ukraine see also lists of lunar eclipses map all coordinates using openstreetmap google maps download coordinates as kml gpx this is a list of solar eclipses that will occur in the 24th century during the period 2301 to 2400 there will be 248 solar eclipses of which 88 will be partial 86 will be annular 66 will be total and 8 will be hybrids the greatest number of eclipses in one year will be four in 18 different years 2304 2311 2318 2322 2326 2329 2333 2340 2344 2347 2351 2358 2362 2369 2380 2383 2391 and 2398 two months september 2304 and august 2380 will have two eclipses date time of greatest eclipse saros cycle type magnitude central duration location path width geographical area ref s 14 00 59 133 total 1.0354 168 km 104 mi 17 19 33 138 annular 0.9786 126 km 78 mi 00 47 19 143 annular
